com.facebook.litho.testing.viewtree

Class ViewTreeAssert

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • com.facebook.litho.testing.viewtree.ViewTreeAssert

  • public final class ViewTreeAssert
extends <any>
    Assertions which require checking an entire view tree

    NOTE: Assertions looking for visible attributes are limited to checking the visibility of the nodes, but do not check actual layout. So a visible view might have 0 pixels available for it in actual app code and still pass the checks done here

        public ViewTreeAssert hasVisibleText(java.lang.String text)

      • hasVisibleTextWithTag

        public ViewTreeAssert hasVisibleTextWithTag(java.lang.String text,
                                            int tagId,
                                            java.lang.Object tagValue)
        Tests if any view in the hierarchy under the root, for which the path is visible, has the requested piece of text as its text and has a tag set on that TextView with the given tag id and tag value.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to search for
        tagId - the tag to look for on the TextView containing the searched text
        tagValue - the expected value of the tag associated with tagId
        Returns:
        the assertions object

      • hasVisibleDrawable

        public ViewTreeAssert hasVisibleDrawable(int resourceId)
        Tests if any view in the hierarchy under the root, for which the path is visible, is displaying the requested drawable by the given resource id.

        For this assertion to work, Robolectric must be immediately available and be able to load the drawable corresponding to this resource id.

        Parameters:
        resourceId - the resource id of the drawable to look for
        Returns:
        the assertions object

      • hasVisibleDrawable

        public ViewTreeAssert hasVisibleDrawable(Drawable drawable)
        Tests if any view in the hierarchy under the root, for which the path is visible, is displaying the requested drawable
        Parameters:
        drawable - the drawable to look for
        Returns:
        the assertions object

      • doesNotHaveVisibleDrawable

        public ViewTreeAssert doesNotHaveVisibleDrawable(int resourceId)
        Tests all views in the hierarchy under the root, for which the path is visible, do not have the requested drawable by the given resource id. For this assertion to work, Robolectric must be immediately available and be able to load the drawable corresponding to this resource id.
        Parameters:
        resourceId - the resource id of the drawable to look for
        Returns:
        the assertions object
